org.openimaj.ml.timeseries.processor.interpolation

Class LinearInterpolationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.timeseries.processor.interpolation.TimeSeriesInterpolation
      • org.openimaj.ml.timeseries.processor.interpolation.LinearInterpolationProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeSeriesProcessor<double[],Double,DoubleTimeSeries>

    public class LinearInterpolationProcessor
extends TimeSeriesInterpolation
    Perform a linear interpolation such that the value of data at time t1 between t0 and t2 = data[t1] = data[t0] * (t1 - t0)/(t2-t0) + data[t2] * (t2 - t1)/(t2-t0) Note that this means if data is known at t1, then t0 = t1 and data[t1] == data[t0]
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
